name: Push Away
description:
Summary

"Push Away" is a short narrative game about why silence means, "No." 

Controls

  • Click and hold to push away

Recommended

  • External mouse
  • Headphones

Credits 

A Game by  Atley Loughridge & Jacob Knipfing

Art by  Wesley Allsbrook

Sound & Music by Julie Buchanan

Art Pipeline by Rakib Sharkar

3D Car Art by Ivan Razza

Press Package by Jamie Parreno

Logo by Amir Alavi

Special Thanks
